data.comment: The first-half is under way at Stade Le Canonnier - Waasland-Beveren kick-off to start the match.
The first-half is under way at Stade Le Canonnier - Waasland-Beveren kick-off to start the match.
Dirk Geeraerd is making the team's first substitution at Stade Le Canonnier with Andrija Vukcevic replacing Daam Foulon.
The first-half is over at Stade Le Canonnier.
Marko Bakic (Mouscron) has received a yellow card from Lawrence Visser.
Lawrence Visser blows to start the second-half. Mouscron with the kick-off.
The home team have replaced Dimitri Mohamed with Jeremy Huyghebaert. This is the first substitution made today by Phillipe Saint-Jean.
Aleix Garcia for Mouscron has been booked by Lawrence Visser and receives a first yellow card.
Din Sula is replacing Jur Schryvers for Waasland-Beveren at Stade Le Canonnier.
Goal! Mouscron have got their heads in front thanks to a Frank Boya strike.
Waasland-Beveren's Maximiliano Caufriez has been booked in Mouscron.
Phillipe Saint-Jean (Mouscron) is making a second substitution, with Babacar Dione replacing Marko Bakic.
Phillipe Saint-Jean is making the team's third substitution at Stade Le Canonnier with Benjamin van Durmen replacing Diogo Queiros.
